message.body: yeah, it was completely random that I happen to be there though
so not like I was counting on it or anything
yeah
but that would have been awesome
just would have been an added bonus
so how was P Jams and the 1940s
i imagine you guys in there listening to the games on the radio - boiling hot water and the ladies knitting
hahahah
I mean it is nice to not have TV you know,
or at least not always have it on
BUT
cmon
yeah i mean i know where they are coming from
but...
it was good, her husband is a douche
is he?
and Saturday we went to at night so I just went and found a bar early to watch the game and then met up with them at the party
She met him out there
big time bicyclist hipster kind of guy
made some comments here and there that made you not feel completely welcome
really?
how so?
just with us bringing a baby into their world you know
trying to think
what the fuck did he expect?!
good lord.
for real
like Karen is all about Cooper
her biological clock is TICK TOCK TICK TOCK
and Kristen and I went for a run and left cooper with them
and he cried a little bit
and he was like "well that pushed my timeline back at least a year"
what an asshole
yeah and if he thinks that was bad
he has another thing coming
cause in a year i won't be an asshat
because there are days that completely suck
with a kid
i bet
and to have him be a little whiney is nothing
no kidding
you should expect that
also the kind of guy where he would ask you a questionand then about half way through answering you wanted to just stop talking because you could tell he wasn't listening
very into himself
gross
i can't stand that
which was disappointing because I really like Karen, and didn't feel like we were with the real karen
well what is she like with him?
is he a doosh to her too?
very subservient
wow
that doesn't strike me as her style
like this is the way kristen kind of put it
kristen is old fashion
def take care of your husband
cook clean, etc
really?
but it was almost like he demanded/expected it
weird
that sucks ass
amanda would NEVER allow me to act like that
she would straight up crush me
haha
like I said Kristen is def a bit old fashion in that way
yeah but you appreciate the shit out of it
but at the same time I don't abuse it or expect and do my shit too
and go out of your way to let her know
exactly
and you clean
i have seen you
never abuse it or expect it
and she expects that from you
and you do house work
yeah it was just like you felt she was a little brainwashed
that is being a bit bold
but just kind of that feeling
i know what you mean though
their dynamic is a certain way
yeah
and it was awful
and not the way you would expect
or hope for
needless to say you aren't dying to go back for another visit
just when we hang out with Karen it is usually a really really good time
totally
and the worst was it just made Kristen feel bad a little
like it isn't easy to travel with a kid
she fels bad for her you mean?
I mean she just didn't feel like it was as great as it could have been and that Karen maybe wasn't dying to have us out
like a best friend should
yeah that sucks ass
imgaine you saw me once a year
and you came to us and it was fun
yeah and the one time it felt like i was imposing
but at times you felt i was indifferent that you were there
that would SUCK
how long the two of them been married?
but the last night that Kristen was in san fran her and Karen went out to happy hour with cooper and had a really really good time
so that made up for it
she was like it was the old karen
so it was good, just a little disappointed because we expected it to be better - and like you said - not dying to go back
they got married last summer
yeah - maybe next time she comes to you
just her ;)
for real
maybe they are still in new couple-dom
and not used to it yet
who knows
yeah who knows
he is just a douche
takes some time to settle in i guess
does he look like this http://cl.ly/image/1J3e1C2z320V
but it was fun when they came down to san Jose
kristen had family down there too so we went and saw some her family and my mornings were pretty open so that was fun
yeah that is great

https://www.google.com/search?q=kent+newman&rlz=1C1LENP_enUS513US513&aq=f&um=1&ie=UTF-8&hl=en&tbm=isch&source=og&sa=N&tab=wi&ei=xeVRUfbrOurB4APg34GoCQ&biw=1090&bih=438&sei=x-VRUcO9L_bG4AOPr4D4Dg#imgrc=oTNsh34fXTvvkM%3A%3BUA8CxgBWLwd8mM%3Bhttp%253A%252F%252Fm3.licdn.com%252Fmpr%252Fmpr%252Fshrink_80_80%252Fp%252F1%252F000%252F034%252F0b7%252F2cdee71.jpg%3Bhttp%253A%252F%252Fwww.linkedin.com%252Fpub%252Fdir%252FKent%252FNewman%3B80%3B80
oh that is him?
yep
he doesn't look like a hipster
not really
looks like a toolbox
he isn't 100% hipster
but like he wore jean capri pants
one day
another day he wore pink pants
haha okay
nut huggers?
basically
one day he wore a trucker type hat and was all pumped afterwords because people like his hat at the party
like talked about it for 5 min
HAHAHA
then he wore a fedora hat with his pink pants the next day
goodness
well sounds like someone i couldn't get a long with
kinda sounds like a poser-hipster
yes
and he is nice enough for an evening
yeah but a weekend at his hosue
just expected more from Karen
too much
and we are so close with Karen and even her family
did you see Petey?
yep
he is doing well
same old pete
you see his new place?
yep
you see Lindsay?
pretty cool
how is she
big?
not really
barely showing
still tiny
yeah...
could be confused with just a little tummy
well good for them
they seemed really good
good for them
their house is in a really cool area
love that little guy
yeah it seemed like it
you have been to the hollywood hills right?
in LA?
where all the expensive houses are
yeah
i have drive through
it had a very similar feel
winding streets
oh that is really nice
with lots of trees and privacy
i bet it was expensive as shit
yeah
they are right at the base of the hill, but still cool
and I am sure it was $$$$$
yeah i am sure it was
i bet he makes quite a bit though
knowing what they pay people like him at LS
yeah and you know he has always done well
He is someone I have no doubt will hit it big at some point
yeah he is a smart ki
kid
not that he isn't already successful
yeah i know what you mean though
i need to start some mobile app with him
hahaa
make our milliions
lol
i had a really deep conversation with joey on friday
all about his opinion on gays
oh yeah?
anything come out of it interesting
i had sent him a link to a Macklemore video
love that song
but then said "oh wait you probably won't like that because the first song is about gay marriage"
and i wasn't trying to be a dick
but just saying ...
and he was like "you think i just hate anything having to do with gays??"
basically in the end i got him to admit that he has based his opinions in the past on stuff that his dad told him about how gay marriage hurts the church
but today can't really remember it
but still holds that opinion
man
despite the fact that he saw my logical argument
think for yourself man
but man - dude needs to move out of his house
that is what i said to him
yes
"i wont say that ill think outside my religion but i will say that i will do my homework and figure out if in fact if it does or doesn not affect the church"
that is what bothers me about religion
you are allow to have SOME free thoughts
outside of what you are told to believe
yeah
but joey doesn't think that
this is what i said to him before he said that

"saying, i believe in God and the Bible, and I believe that my religion doesn't approve of a gay lifestyle - is valid i can accept that i may not agree with it but i won't argue on it but i would implore you to think a little outside the religion's take on it because I think you would see, at least in this case, it doesn't have any affect on your or your religion it is a legal argument"
and then i said to him - gay marriage has been legal in NY for over two years - can you point to any example of it affecting you or your church
but - dude - as soon as we lost him after college - we lost him
church has won
also ... this: http://www.nflshop.com/product/index.jsp?productId=17570896&cp=2237746.2250499&pageType=family&parentPage=family
oh man that is awesome
i never saw that before
me either
i have a jersey
but not a onesie thingy
same
i love it
Cooper would have been wearing tat every time I dressed him
haha
yep
you gotta get him a dangeruss one
how great is it that we both have QBs we love now
yeah I will probably get him a Russell jersey next year
he has earl thomas now
for real
yeah i have an Orakpo
for the baby
John got it for him
plus I have russell and earl, so he should have the same
definitely
and dude Russ is so good
it pumps me up that you guys drafted him after we had that convo about him during the Wisconsin bowl game - and that he ended up being awesome
also pumps me up that I had a convo with Broullire before the 2011 season that I wanted the Skins to land RG3
and then he won the heisman
and we got him
going to be a lot of games against Hawks and Skins
yeah lots of games in our future
plus for 2013 lot of primetime games for our teams
yeah thank god
just hope RG3 can play in half of them
and we finally have a real rival
i bet they backload our shit
oh we def do
although I hope, at least between us, it is based on mutual respect
yeah you guys do for sure
I mean for te Hawks
we finally have a division rival
being new the NFC west we didn't really have a legit rival
now between us and San Fran there is real hatred
and both teams are good
and the Eagles suck - so when greg used to shit on us constantly
YES!!!!
they sucks ass
i hope Chip Kelly is a massive bust
but i dunno
me too
not sure what to think about him
me too
i go both ways
I still kid of think he is going = spurrier
me too
i sure hope soo
too cocky of a guy

yo - so, best offseason move so far

one singular
move
best one
in the league

of course
harvin?
I like both the avril and harvin deals
both are big upgrades
avril in part because of the deal
Harvin was huge
i love Avril
i think he is a good player was surprised he didn't get more action
i mean what could rival those
dumervill to Bmore is good
I think
what other good deals?
yeah that is a big one
let's take money out of it
because you and I don't care
all i care about is impact on team
i care
if the team is much better because of a player - i don't care if they pay him 12 million or 10
to me that is part of why I love the avril move
because of hte contract
but for this argument we can do that
goldson to TB is a good move
for them
i am not sure i can make a case against Harvin
just giving up a #1
that is the only case against
yeah but in this year
who cares
you know who I think is going to have a big year next year
i could maybe even argue Harvin is best move
avril is sevond best
under the cut signing
who?

on the Ravens

you think they are planning on user Spears as an OLB i guess

they did

I woudl assume Spears and Dummervil will both spend time at DE
i mean OLB
yeah

Dumervill is pretty small for 4-3 DE let alone a 3-4 DE
yeah
but that is some nice dpeth and mix and match ability
for packages and what not
I was thinking OLB Suggs DE Spears DT Ngata DE Canty OLB Dumervil
i mean that is 5 monsters
having played against Canty for so long i can tell you - that dude is underrated
yeah that is probably their base
sick

so I will give him the benifit of the doubt
i could see him being a fringe Pro Bowler
because of Reid
